title: GREEN - I Wish to be a Farmer’s Wife
original_name: GREEN―農家のヨメになりたい
sinopse: Wako is on a camping trip with friends in the countryside. At the riverside she meets a young farmer, who asks her to carry a basket to his house. For Wako it´s love at first sight. From now on she tries to win his heart and to manage the hard life on a farm.
